name: Fire Breath
description:
Inhale, stoking your inner flame. Release to exhale, burning enemies in a cone in front of you for 22,965 Fire damage, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Empowering causes more of the damage to be dealt immediately instead of over time.

I:   Deals 6,271 damage instantly and 16,694 over 20 sec.

II:  Deals 11,254 damage instantly and 11,686 over 14 sec.

III: Deals 16,298 damage instantly and 6,677 over 8 sec.
